function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Investigation of various implemented technologies and their influence in controlling the pandemic.","Impact":"Failure to identify effective technologies for controlling the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Thorough research and testing of technologies before implementation.","Technologies":"Advanced data analysis, simulation modeling, and artificial intelligence for technology evaluation.","People":"Public health officials, researchers, and policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies."}]}
